thread.title: Orest Supyk

author: Orest Supyk
title: Orest Supyk
text: I use MSE to find the best deal for me taking into account price, service and reviews. Consequently I end up changing every year. The standard tariffs would be 2 to 3 hundred pounds a year more than I'm paying. I'm very cost conscious therefore I will always put price first and look at reviews. The suppliers should automatically put you/charge you according to the tariff which is best for you. But they don't. The Regulator needs to do something about this as collectively the public is paying billions of pounds over the odds. British Gas could give an end of year rebate if they could have paid less on a different tariff...
